text: Rhys Cadwaladr (fl. 1666 - 1690) was a Welsh language poet and classical scholar, born in Conwy, north Wales. ==Notes== Category:1690 deaths Category:People from Conwy Category:Welsh-language poets Category:17th-century Welsh writers Category:17th-century male writers Category:17th-century Welsh poets Category:Year of birth unknown
title: Rhys Cadwaladr
